type CustomLineCap = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface ICloneable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 封装自定义的用户定义的线帽。

span.span: Encapsulates a custom user-defined line cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线条帽用于线条的开头和结尾，或由 GDI + 对象绘制的曲线 。Line caps are used at the beginnings and ends of lines or curves drawn by GDI+ objects. GDI + 支持多个预定义的线帽样式，并且还允许用户定义自己的 cap 样式。GDI+ supports several predefined cap styles, and also allows users to define their own cap styles. 此类用于创建自定义线帽样式。This class is used to create custom cap styles. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates how to use the class. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example paste, the code into a Windows Form. 处理窗体的 事件，并 `DrawCaps` 从窗体的 事件处理方法调用，并将 `e` 作为传递 。Handle the form's event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的轮廓和填充初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified outline and fill.

summary.span: 使用指定的轮廓和填充初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified outline and fill.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "缠绕" 填充模式，而不考虑为操作指定的填充模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和 `strokePath` 参数不能同时使用。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 必须为一个参数传递 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果这两个参数都不是传递到 null 值， `fillPath` 则将被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果 `strokePath` 为 `null` ，则 `fillPath` 应截获负 y 轴。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 处理窗体的 事件，并 `DrawCaps` 从窗体的 事件处理方法调用，并将 `e` 作为传递 。Handle the form's event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "缠绕" 填充模式，而不考虑为操作指定的填充模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和 `strokePath` 参数不能同时使用。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 必须为一个参数传递 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果这两个参数都不是传递到 null 值， `fillPath` 则将被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果 `strokePath` 为 `null` ，则 `fillPath` 应截获负 y 轴。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.

summary.span: 获取或设置相对于 对象的宽度此 类对象的缩放量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount by which to scale this Class object with respect to the width of the object.
The amount by which to scale the cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定与自定义线帽的大小相乘的笔宽的倍数。This property specifies the multiple of the pen width by which to multiply the size of the custom cap. 例如，如果此属性等于1，则自定义顶端宽度为10，自定义顶端高度为5，而绘制线条时使用的是宽度为3的笔，则帽的宽度为30个单位，15个单位为高。For example, if this property equals 1, the custom cap width is 10, the custom cap height is 5, and a line is drawn with a pen with a width of 3, then the cap is drawn 30 units wide and 15 units high. 如果将此属性设置为3，则会将 cap 绘制为90单位宽，并使45单位为高。Setting this property to 3 causes the cap to be drawn 90 units wide and 45 units high.
